nodes.text: Stardust was a tea bar that was located in the city of Gadrin, on the planet Cularin.

Stardust was located in the center of Gadrin, near to the square where the statue of Reidi Artom was. The ground floor of the tea bar was ran as a "fast food" operation, where tea and snacks could purchased from over a counter, to go or to eat on the bar's canteen-style tables. The first floor was different, with a lounge that opened up onto a veranda that overlooked the square. It was more beautifully furnished and upstairs patrons were served at their tables.
Stardust operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic and was owned by the Wookiee Shrandhnrignh.
